lyrics:
Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh
Oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh oh

Bass

It's quarter to two
And I've still got you
On my mind, oh baby
I'm just a prisoner

Trapped in the chains
Of your love, it cuts like a knife

Oh, darling

I'm up to the challenge
And I'm willing to fight
I'd do anything to have you
With me tonight, oh baby

I'd swim a river
If the river was wide
I'd climb a mountain
If the mountain was high

I'd do anything, girl
Just to be by your side
I'm out of my mind
My love is a fire

It's heaven on earth
And we don't need words
To describe it
I'm lost in forever

I don't ever wanna come down
I was a fool
I broke every rule before you, girl

And I've looked high and low
Now that I've found you, girl
I can't let you go, oh baby

If the river was wide
Id climb a mountain
If the mountain was high

Id do anything, girl
Just to be by your side
I'm out of my mind
My love is a fire
